topic.title: Comments and Change Tracking - Input XML fragment

body.p: In the following sections we will see how each of the change types are structured.

section.title: Insertions
section.p: For an insert, the structure defining the insertion details is inside the range, the inserted text is highlighted by an oxy-insert-hl element. The details are stored in the oxy-insert element.
section.codeblock:
<oxy:oxy-range-start id="sc_1" hr_id="1"/>
<oxy:oxy-insert href="#sc_1" hr_id="1"> <oxy:oxy-author>dan</oxy:oxy-author> <oxy:oxy-content>insert</oxy:oxy-content> <oxy:oxy-date>2018/03/15</oxy:oxy-date> <oxy:oxy-hour>09:38:29</oxy:oxy-hour> <oxy:oxy-tz>+02:00</oxy:oxy-tz> </oxy:oxy-insert>
<oxy:oxy-insert-hl>This is an insert!!</oxy:oxy-insert-hl>
<oxy:oxy-range-end hr_id="1"/>

section.title: Comments
section.p: Similar to the insert, there is defined a range around the commented content. There are the comment details in the oxy-comment element. The highlighted content is wrapped in a oxy-comment-hl.

p.codeblock:
<oxy:oxy-range-start id="sc_1" hr_id="1"/>
<oxy:oxy-comment href="#sc_1" hr_id="1"> <oxy:oxy-author>dan</oxy:oxy-author> <oxy:oxy-comment-text>This is a comment.</oxy:oxy-comment-text> <oxy:oxy-date>2018/03/15</oxy:oxy-date> <oxy:oxy-hour>09:56:59</oxy:oxy-hour> <oxy:oxy-tz>+02:00</oxy:oxy-tz> </oxy:oxy-comment>
<oxy:oxy-comment-hl>Context</oxy:oxy-comment-hl>
<oxy:oxy-range-end hr_id="1"/>

section.title: Attribute changes
section.p: The attribute changes are more complex. The range is empty, and is directly under the affected element (the one that has modified attributes). The oxy-attributes give details about multiple attribute changes, each stored in a oxy-attributed-change.

p.codeblock:
<element>
<oxy:oxy-range-start id="sc_3" hr_id="3"/> <oxy:oxy-range-end hr_id="3"/>
<oxy:oxy-attributes href="#sc_3" hr_id="3">
<oxy:oxy-attribute-change type="inserted" name="platform"> <oxy:oxy-author>dan</oxy:oxy-author> <oxy:oxy-current-value>windows</oxy:oxy-current-value> <oxy:oxy-date>2018/03/15</oxy:oxy-date> <oxy:oxy-hour>10:05:04</oxy:oxy-hour> <oxy:oxy-tz>+02:00</oxy:oxy-tz> </oxy:oxy-attribute-change> .... <oxy:oxy-attribute-change type="removed" name="audience"> .... </oxy:oxy-attribute-change> </oxy:oxy-attributes> ... </element>

section.title: Deletions
section.p: For a deletion there are some elements defining the start and end of the deletion, and the highlighted text, the element oxy-delete-hl.
section.codeblock:
<oxy:oxy-range-start id="sc_2" hr_id="2"/>
<oxy:oxy-delete-hl> This is a deleted text. </oxy:oxy-delete-hl>
<oxy:oxy-range-end hr_id="2"/>
section.p: There is a structure that gives details about the change, the oxy-delete. This is linked to the above deletion range by the same ID value:
section.codeblock: <oxy:oxy-delete href="#sc_2" hr_id="2"> <oxy:oxy-author>dan</oxy:oxy-author> <oxy:oxy-content><step><cmd>This is a deleted <image href="ac%20co.. </oxy:oxy-content> <oxy:oxy-date>2018/03/14</oxy:oxy-date> <oxy:oxy-hour>11:38:06</oxy:oxy-hour> <oxy:oxy-tz>+02:00</oxy:oxy-tz> </oxy:oxy-delete>
